敬.definition: (bound form) respectful; to respect; to offer politely

敬上.definition: yours truly; yours sincerely (at the end of a letter)

敬告.definition: to tell respectfully; to announce reverentially

敬啟者.definition: Dear Sirs; To Whom It May Concern

敬奉.definition: to worship piously; to present; to dedicate

敬悉.definition: (honorific) revered news; the most valuable information (in your recent letter, book etc); Thank you for your letter.

敬惜字紙.definition: to treasure written material as a cultural resource (idiom)

敬愛.definition: to respect and love; to hold in high esteem

敬業樂群.definition: diligent and sociable (idiom); meticulous in work and dealing cheerfully with one's colleagues

敬煙.definition: to offer a cigarette (to a guest)

敬祝.definition: to offer humbly (written at the end of letter to sb of higher status); your humble servant

敬神.definition: to respect a deity; to pray to a God

敬稱.definition: to address or refer to (sb) respectfully (as ...); respectful term of address; honorific title

敬老尊賢.definition: to respect the wise and venerate the worthy (idiom); to honor the great and the good

敬老席.definition: priority seating for the aged (on buses etc)

敬老院.definition: senior citizens' home; old folks' home

敬而遠之.definition: to show respect from a distance (idiom); to remain at a respectful distance

敬若神明.definition: to hold sb in the same regard as one would a god (idiom)

敬語.definition: honorific (e.g. in grammar of oriental languages)

敬謝不敏.definition: please excuse me for not complying; to politely decline

敬賢禮士.definition: (idiom) to respect people of virtue and show courtesy to scholars

敬贈.definition: to present respectfully; with (sb's) compliments; complimentary

敬酒.definition: to toast; to propose a toast

敬酒不吃吃罰酒.pinyin: jing4 jiu3 bu4 chi1 chi1 fa2 jiu3
敬酒不吃吃罰酒.definition: lit. to refuse a toast only to be forced to drink a forfeit (idiom); fig. to turn down a request only to be forced later to comply with it under pressure

敬重.definition: to respect deeply; to revere; to esteem

敬鬼神而遠之.pinyin: jing4 gui3 shen2 er2 yuan3 zhi1
敬鬼神而遠之.definition: to respect Gods and demons from a distance (idiom); to remain at a respectful distance
